Jonathan Zerez Mechanical Design Engineer @ Amazon Robotics I'm a mechanical engineer interested in computational simulation, optimization, and design automation. This website is a brief showcasing of some of the various projects I've worked on

About

My name is Jonathan, and I'm from Honolulu, Hawaii. My hobbies include watch making, running, swimming, longboarding, and cooking. As an engineer, I'm particularly interested in applying modeling and simulation to solve complex engineering problems.

I received my BS in mechanical Engineering at Olin College in 2021 and I currently work as a Mechanical Design Engineer at Amazon Robotics.

Work Experiences

August 2021 - Current Mechanical Design Engineer @ Amazon Robotics
•Developing mechanical components and sensing system for Amazon's first fully autonomous mobile robot
May 2020 - August 2020 Hardware Engineering Intern @ Amazon Robotics
•Performed system analysis to define requirements and carried out mechanical design for a mobile robotic platform.
June 2019 - August 2019 Mechanical Engineering Intern @ Thirty Meter Telescope International Observatory
•Created MATLAB tool to perform data acquisition and analysis for vibrational testing for telescope test structure.
June 2018 - August 2018 Full Stack Intern @ Track.com
•Created MySQL database and mobile app using React Native to allow users to keep track of their personal data.

Education

2017 - 2021 Franklin W. Olin College of Engineering
•BS in Mechanical Engineering
